C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: pulsar-bookkeeper
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/bookkeeper.conf && OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar bookie

initContainers.name: wait-zookeeper-ready

args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/bookkeeper.conf && bin/bookkeeper shell metaformat --nonInteractive || true;
initContainers.name: pulsar-bookkeeper-metaformat

containers.name: pulsar-proxy
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/proxy.conf && OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar proxy

containers.name: pulsar-proxy-ws
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/websocket.conf && OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar websocket

containers.name: pulsar-zookeeper
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/zookeeper.conf && bin/generate-zookeeper-config.sh conf/zookeeper.conf && OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar zookeeper

containers.name: pulsar-broker
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/broker.conf && bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/client.conf && bin/gen-yml-from-env.py conf/functions_worker.yml && OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar broker

initContainers.name: wait-zookeeper-ready

containers.name: pulsar-autorecovery
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/bookkeeper.conf && OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/bookkeeper autorecovery

initContainers.name: wait-zookeeper-ready

containers.name: pulsar-bastion
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/client.conf && exec /bin/bash -c "trap : TERM INT; sleep infinity & wait"
